mapper.insert: insert into store(no, name, category, address, phone, menu, detail, hashtag, image, map_lt, map_ln) values(st_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{category},#{address},#{phone},#{menu},#{detail},#{hashtag},#{image},#{map_lt},#{map_ln})
mapper.update: update store set view_count = view_count + 1 where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select no, name, category, view_count, image from (select no, name, category,view_count, image, rownum r from (select * from store order by no desc) order by no desc) where r >= #{start} AND r <= #{end}

select count(*) from store
name like '%'||#{search}||'%' category like '%'||#{search}||'%'

select no, name, category, address , phone, map_lt, map_ln, menu, detail, view_count, hashtag, image, (select count(ltlike) from liketable where ltbid=#{no} and ltlike=1)as blike from store where no=#{no}

select no, name, category, address , phone, map_lt, map_ln, menu, detail, view_count, hashtag, image, (select count(ltlike) from liketable where ltbid=no and ltlike=1) as blike from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by no desc) as RNUM, store.* from store)store where RNUM between #{start} and #{end}
select * from store where name like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR category like '%'||#{search}||'%' OR menu like '%'||#{search}||'%'

select no, name, category, address , phone, map_lt, map_ln, menu, detail, view_count, hashtag, image, (select count(ltlike) from liketable where ltbid=no and ltlike=1) as blike from (select ROW_NUMBER() over(order by no desc) as RNUM, store.* from store) store where RNUM between #{start} and #{end} order by view_count desc
